title: Little Bear's House: Fun & Interactive Learning
blurb: Holistic playground for fun and interactive learning.
description: Little Bear's House is a holistic playground designed for fun and interactive learning experiences. It offers a variety of play areas and activities suitable for young children, focusing on both physical and cognitive development. The playground features interactive learning stations, creative play zones, and engaging activities that encourage children to explore, learn, and grow. With a focus on creating a stimulating and safe environment, Little Bear's House aims to provide a space where children can develop essential skills while having fun. It is designed to cater to families looking for enriching and educational play experiences for their kids in Singapore.
address_display: 21 Lichfield Road, Serangoon Garden Way, Singapore 556841

title: Little Bear's House: Interactive Learning Haven
blurb: Indoor playground with toys for exploration and fun.
description: Little Bear’s House is a 2500 square feet indoor playground located in Serangoon Gardens, Singapore. It offers a variety of toys and designated play zones to encourage children's development through exploration, discovery, social interaction, and imagination. Play zones include developmental play, interactive play, social play, imaginative play, and cognitive play areas. A small feeding area is available for families. It is an ideal option for kids to enjoy some fun, entertaining, engaging and interactive play in a more intimate and less dynamic play setting. Socks are required for entry. It is a good place for quality bonding time with your little ones.
address_display: 21 Lichfield Road, Serangoon Garden Way, Singapore 556841

items.blurb: Educational learning tools for the young ones.

This play area features books, puzzles, threading toys, and fidget toys designed to stimulate cognitive development and enhance problem-solving skills. It's an ideal space for families looking to combine play with learning, providing a holistic experience that caters to the intellectual growth of kids.

title: Jewel Changi Airport: Adventure Awaits for Families
blurb: Explore attractions like Mirror Maze & Canopy Park.
description: Jewel Changi Airport offers a variety of attractions suitable for families and children. The Mirror Maze provides an engaging and interactive experience, challenging visitors to navigate through a labyrinth of reflections. The Manulife Sky Nets offer both walking and bouncing options, providing thrilling experiences with stunning views. Canopy Park, located at the topmost level of Jewel, features gardens, walking trails, and play areas, making it a perfect spot for relaxation and recreation. These attractions cater to a wide range of ages and interests, ensuring that everyone can find something to enjoy. Jewel Changi Airport is a great destination for families looking to spend quality time together and create lasting memories. The attractions are designed to be both fun and safe, providing a memorable experience for all visitors. With its unique blend of nature and entertainment, Jewel Changi Airport is a must-visit destination in Singapore.
address_display: Singapore
